### Summary

We should add a CI test compiling with `cflags=-frecord-gcc-switches` and running `readelf -p .GCC.command.line` afterwards to check which packages inject "unwanted" flags.

### Rationale

Some build recipes inject unwanted flags that we should detect and warn about during the code review.

### Description

Compile with `-frecord-gcc-switches` and look at the `.GCC.command.line` block of the binaries/libraries afterwards.

### Additional information

_No response_

title: Add CI test running "-frecord-gcc-switches"
